data.title: Bondi Campus
data.text:
The Sisterhood not only gathers on Thursday mornings, but we believe in the power of community and a collective spirit. During the week we gather at different times & places to embrace the vision of our church and involve ourselves in the movement across the earth.

Sisterhood gathers each week 9.30am for a 10am start Location: City Campus 188 Young St, Waterloo, NSW 2017

We have parking options & central bus runs to help make it easier for you in the morning.

Location for Pick Up and Drop Off: At the intersection of Chalmers Street and Elizabeth Street outside of Central Station at the entrance of Prince Alfred Park.

Pick Up Times: 9:25am & 9:40am

Drop Off After Service: 15 minutes after service

If you find yourself wanting to stay a little longer after the service with some ladies and won’t make the drop off time- don’t worry! You can catch an M20 bus to Central Station from the intersection of Philip Street and Young Street, a block away from the church.

While you enjoy the morning our Hillsong Kids team provide quality programs on site, starting from 6 months old.

Sisterhood also gathers on United Nights, locally through connect groups, connect mornings & Be The Change.
